alert.note: Alert for Emmons; Grant; Morton; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 11 at 12:15PM CST until March 12 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST/11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO 1 PM CDT /NOON MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Emmons, Grant, Morton, and Sioux Counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until Midnight CST/11 PM MST/ tonight. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from Midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to 1 PM CDT /Noon MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
